fields.name: NodePoolName
fields.description: A name for the node pool. Must be unique within the Civo Kubernetes cluster.

fields.name: Cluster
fields.description:
Reference to the Civo Kubernetes cluster in which to create this node pool.
 Accepts the cluster's name or a reference to the CivoKubernetesCluster resource.

fields.name: Size
fields.description:
The slug identifier for the size of each node in the pool (e.g., "g4s.kube.medium").
 Defines the CPU and memory of the nodes.

fields.name: NodeCount
fields.description: The number of nodes to provision in the pool. Must be at least 1.

fields.name: AutoScale
fields.description: Enable auto-scaling for this node pool. If true, the platform manages node count between min_nodes and max_nodes.

fields.name: MinNodes
fields.description: Minimum number of nodes when auto-scaling is enabled. Required if auto_scale is true.

fields.name: MaxNodes
fields.description: Maximum number of nodes when auto-scaling is enabled. Required if auto_scale is true.

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: A list of tags to apply to the node pool for organizational purposes.
